name: C.J.
lyric:
C.J 词曲/SHUNZA
[00:41.INI FROM THE MISTY WATERFALLS
IT SEEMS YA DIDN'T KNOW I'D FALLEN IN LOVE
MUCH TOO SHY TO EVEN GIVE A CLUE
SUDDENLY IT ALL BECAME TOO MUCH
WHAT MUST I HAVE DONE TO BE THE ONE
TO BE BLESSED WITH YOUR KISSES TENDERLY
TELL ME THAT THE SUN WILL RISE ALL NIGHT
BRIGITNESS IN A SONG.POSED FOR ME
C.J. C.J. HE REALLY KNOWS JUST WHAT TO DO
C.J. C.J. I SWEAR TO GOU MY HEART BELONGS TO YOU
AND I GET THE FEELING THAT YOU WANT
TO FORGIVE ME MAYBE ONE OF THESF DAYS
I SAID I CANNOT TAKE BACK WHAT I'VE DONE
BUT I KNOW THAT I MUST BE FAITHFUL THIS WAY
[01:57.E TO ME AND FEEL MY FIRE BURN
'CAUSE I DONT WANT TO WALK THIS ROAD ALL ALONE
KNOW THAT IN THE PAST I PLAYED TOO MANY GAMES
MY LESSON IS LEARNED, THE ANSWER CAME
C.J. C.J. HE REALLY KNOWS JUST WHAT TO DO
C.J. C.J. I SWEAR TO GOD MY HEART BELONGS TO YOU
AND I GET THE FEELING THAT YOU WANT
TO FORGIVE ME MAYBE ONE OF THESE DAYS
'SAID I CANNOT TAKE BACK WHAT I'VE DONE
BUT I KNOW THAT I MUST BE FAITHFUL THIS WAY
FIGURES WHY I FEEL LIKE THE OCEAN IS GROWIN'
AND THE TIDES ARE GETTINI WARM
I MAKE MY WISH QUICKLY TO FALL INTO YOUR SWEET ARMS
RAINBOWS I BREATHE 'CAUSE I BE FEELIN' IN LOVE
IT'S JUST ABOUT THE PRETTIEST DAY I EVER DREAMED
OF PUSHIN'-AND-A-SWAYIN' MAKIN' A LOVE GROOVY
NATURE'S COHERANCE, OH YES, IT SURE DID FOOL ME
THE LAWS OF GRAVITY SHALL KEEP US DOWN LOW
BUT THE TRUEST STAR PULLS UP OUR MIGHTY SOULS
(music)
C.J. C.J. HE REALLY KNOWS JUST WHAT TO DO
C.J. C.J. I SWEAR TO GOD MY HEART BELONGS TO YOU
